text_block_list.text:
What'd ya call me here for? 
Ya wanna go or somethin'?!
text_block_list.name: Espoir City

text_block_list.text:
Correct. I want you to go with me. 
Right now.
text_block_list.name: Furioso

text_block_list.text:
Ya ain't kiddin, eh? Bring it on! 
Here, there, anywhere ya want!
text_block_list.name: Espoir City

text_block_list.text:
Good, let's head to the cafeteria. 
I believe the others should have 
finished the preparations by now.
text_block_list.name: Furioso

text_block_list.text:
Others...?! What? 
This ain't a one-on-one?
text_block_list.name: Espoir City

text_block_list.text:
? Well... Wait, would you... 
Would you have preferred it to be 
with just the two of us...?
text_block_list.name: Furioso

text_block_list.text:
Then, umm... Please spare me some 
more time. I wasn't expecting you 
to make this kind of request...
text_block_list.name: Furioso

text_block_list.text:
Regardless, I'll do whatever I can 
to extend my hospitality to you. 
Today is your birthday, after all.
text_block_list.name: Furioso

text_block_list.text:
Ya'd better prepare your butt off! 
It's my birthday indeed...
text_block_list.name: Espoir City

text_block_list.text:
Ah? Birthday...? 
T-That's what you meant?!?! 
Gaaaaah!!!
text_block_list.name: Espoir City

text_block_list.text:
That's right. Hence... 
Let me prepare our one-on-one...!
text_block_list.name: Furioso
